Entries.wedding: Marriage is an experience. You'll have a lot of discoveries waiting for you.
Maru was so happy during the ceremony.#$e#Marriage is an experience. You'll have a lot of discoveries waiting for you.
Sebastian was really unhappy here. Partly because of me...#$e#I hope his new situation will make him and you happy.
Congratulation on your wedding. Here's something i made for you. [220]
Sam, married... It's hard to believe. Take this.[206]#$e#It's a pizza i made especially for both of you. It's not traditional, but he likes that so much.
Marriage is a big change. But it can be one of the most beautiful.
I wasn't here for Sam for a lot of thing, but i'm happy i was here for the marriage.#$e#And i'll guide him if he needs me.
Each marriage we have here bring me joy. I like seeing this town full of life.$h
Ah, marriages are so romantic.*sigh*#$e#I hope Shane and you will be happy on your farm.
